text: Soerjadi Soedirdja (11 October 1938 â€“ 3 August 2021) was an Indonesian politician. He was Governor of Jakarta from 1992 to 1997. He was born in Batavia, Dutch East Indies. He was also the Minister of Home Affairs between 1999 until 2001 during the Abdurrahman Wahid presidency. Soedirdja died on 3 August 2021 in Jakarta, aged 82. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Indonesian politicians
title: Soerjadi Soedirdja
